name: Martinitoren
description:
Martinitoren VR-AR is a virtual tour prototype of Martini tower in Groningen, The Netherlands where user can admire the construction from desired perspective and time period, learn information through interactions and admire 360 panoramic city view.

Interactions:

Tower bell — by interacting with the bell, player gets to see a hole in one of the bells which were made by a gun bullet during the revolution in Groningen (World War II).

INSTRUCTIONS: First person experience. Use WASD and Mouse.

The prototype has 3 modes:

Press 1 — Free Roam Mode 

Press 2 — Bell Tower Mode

Press 3 — 360 City Panorama Mode
